# Community Health Files

## Overview
This directory contains GitHub community health files for Melflin OSS.

## Included Files
- `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` - Community standards
- `CONTRIBUTING.md` - Contribution guidelines
- `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` - Issue templates for bugs and features
- `discussions_categories.yml` - GitHub Discussions categories

## Updating Files
Update these files as the project evolves to keep the community healthy and engaged.

## Questions?
Start a [GitHub Discussion](https://github.com/Melflin/melflin-oss/discussions) for questions about contributing.
